Description:

 
East West Bank is one of the largest commercial banks in the United States .It is committed the best financial services provider in the world. The main aim of this project is to develop a Data Warehouse for the East West Bank Credit Card in order to maintain the customer details throughout Worldwide and also maintain some financial services that are running by the Bank. They needed a data warehouse so that they could maintain historical data and central location for integration, Analyze Business in different locations, which could serve a purpose of a DSS for decision makers. 
Roles:
· Understanding the Business and its Requirements.

· Extensively used store procedures, functions, views, Joins, and sub-queries for complex queries involving multiple tables from different databases.

· Designed Packages Using Control Flow Tasks like for Loop Container, For Each Loop Container, Sequential Container, Execute SQL Task and data flow task.           

· Analyzing the Existing System and Understanding the business requirement. Designed and Developed SSIS packages.

· Developed SSIS Packages using OLEDB, file system task in SQL SERVER Integration Services to upload and download the ETL DATA.

· Worked on deployment and scheduling.
